title: 9/15/17 - 'The Boys Are Back In Town'
description:
Stu, Pat and Jeffy take over Friday radio ...UK hit with another terror attack; now what? ...The 'swimsuit' edition to Al Qaeda Magazine ...North Korea attacks Japan again...The white journalist who thinks he's black, Shaun King goes after 'America's' team (according to Stu) ...Powering 1 hairdryer with wind energy ...Update: Colin Kaepernick STILL sucks at football ...'National Candle Safety Day' doesn't go so well ...Hillary's new book tour chugs along and still nothing is her fault ...

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
